channel.name: 3ABN US
channel.title: Today Cooking
channel.desc: Not only will kids or grandkids enjoy the tasty foods, but they'll love helping make them as well; they are fed with foods they love, made healthy.

channel.name: 3ABN US
channel.title: 3ABN Kids Camp Sing Along
channel.desc: The hosts teach young campers a variety of Christian songs and dances as they share the message of God.

channel.name: 3ABN US
channel.title: Bible Treasures
channel.desc: How prayer works; the crew is on a mission to understand what happens when believers talk to God; a story with a surprising twist helps them see how God is always listening.

channel.name: 3ABN US
channel.title: Kids Camp Critters & Creation
channel.desc: Observing God's creations - from rocks and fossils to animals with silky fur and shiny scales.

channel.name: 3ABN US
channel.title: 3ABN Kids Camp Fit Club
channel.desc: Working hard to strengthen the temple of our body, by training in a disciplined manner, contributes to serving Jesus and living a life dedicated to Him.

channel.name: 3ABN US
channel.title: When We Talk
channel.desc: Hosts Steven and Tamara Conway talk about the significance of blended families and how they are formed.

channel.name: 3ABN US
channel.title: Salvation in Symbols and Signs
channel.desc: A beautiful picture of Jesus is painted in Daniel chapter nine; the team uncovers wonderful gems of truth.
